reviewText: A fun time-managemnent game--similar to Ranch Rush or Farm Frenzy but slightly more involved. Very enjoyable casual gameplay. I only wish it was longer.

reviewText: Casual time management game with top-notch visual production values, tight gameplay that has some fun concepts and twists on the usual formula and perfectly calculated gold medal times. 10/10 for its genre.\n\nNow bring Gardens Inc. 3 to Steam! :D
